summary:
**The X-Files** is an American TV show about FBI agents Fox Mulder and Dana Scully. They investigate strange cases, like ghosts and aliens. Mulder believes in the paranormal, while Scully, a doctor, looks for scientific explanations. They uncover a secret government plot about aliens and become close friends, later falling in love.

The show has 11 seasons and two movies. It's a mix of ongoing stories about aliens and "monster of the week" episodes. **The X-Files** was very popular and won many awards, becoming a big part of pop culture.
title: The X-Files
